title: Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy 'hated each other' long before epic Twitter spat
text:

Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy faced off today as the War of the WAGS erupted on Twitter .

Wayne Rooney's wife accused rival WAG Rebekah, who's married to Jamie Vardy, of selling stories about her in an epic takedown that almost broke the Internet.

Coleen, 33, was dubbed WAG-atha Christie for her sleuthing, while Rebekah, 32, denied the claims and branded her "disgusting" for scolding her publicly.

Body language expert Judi James has now given her verdict on the warring WAGS and suggested this feud has been going on for much longer than anyone thought.

Pictures taken back in 2016 show the pair at a football match together, with Rebekah appearing to sulk as she sat behind her rival.

Judi explains: "As we brace ourselves for the Xmas season there's a distinct air of panto about Rebekah and Coleen's body language during this recent alleged spat.

"Firstly there's these historic poses when they were presumably friends, with Coleen laughing innocently in the front row while Rebekah sits behind her wearing such a stony facial expression you can almost here the crowds yelling 'Look behind you!'.

"When the two women do chat it appears quite friendly although Coleen's pointed finger could suggest otherwise. "

Coleen, 33, told her followers she became suspicious when stories were getting published about her that only her select followers could know about.

It was then that she came up with a plan to catch whoever it was by planting false stories about her basement flooding, returning to TV and gender selection to see if they got reported.

(Image: PA)

Coleen admitted she blocked all of the accounts that followed her - except the one belonging to Rebekah Vardy - and found that the false stories made it to the press.

Coleen wrote: "For a few years now someone who I trusted to follow me on my personal Instagram account has been consistently informing the sun newspaper of my private posts and stories.



"There has been so much information given to them about me, my friends and family - all without my permission or knowledge.

"After a long time of trying to figure out who it could be, for various reasons, I had a suspicion."

Coleen then revealed the details of her plan to expose the perpretator.

She explained: "To try and prove this, I came up with an idea. I blocked everyone from viewing my Instagram stories except one account (those on my private account must have been wondering why I haven’t had stories on there for a while.)

"Over the past five months I have posted a series of false stories to see if they made their way into the Sun newspaper. And you know what, they did!

"The story about gender selection in Mexico, the story about returning to TV and then the later story about the basement flooding in my new house.

"It’s been tough keeping it to myself and not making any comment at all, especially when the stories have been leaked, however I had to.

"Now I know for certain which account / individual it’s come from. I have saved and screens hotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them.

"It’s......... Rebekah Vardy’s account."
